overview: Tommy offers to contribute to Jessie's college fund but he is low on cash. Luckily for Tommy, she would much rather be treated to her stepdad's hard cock. How do condoms work? Instead of having a relaxing effect, however, the story gets Savannah heated and it seems like an orgasm is the only cure!
title: Relax, He's My Stepdad 3
